new_applications_this_week: You have {count} new applications this week.
job_offer_created_toast_desc: The offer for {title} has been successfully published.
fill_offer_details: Fill in the details for the new position.
job_description_placeholder: Describe the role, responsibilities, and qualifications.
hard_skills_desc: Technical skills that will be used for AI analysis (comma separated).
soft_skills_desc: Soft skills that will be used for AI analysis (comma separated).
preselection_keywords_desc: Candidates' CVs will be scanned for these keywords (comma separated).
scan_qr_code_prompt: Scan this code to go directly to the offer.
candidate_list_description: List of {count} candidates for this offer.
no_candidates_yet: No candidates have applied to this offer yet.
be_the_first_to_share: Be the first to share this offer to receive applications!
candidate_pool_description: Browse all candidates in your talent pool.
click_analyze_to_generate_report: Click 'Analyze Interview' to generate the AI report and matching score for this candidate.
about_origin_p1_2: finds its origin in the Latin word
about_origin_p2: This choice of name reflects our main mission: to bring clarity and light to the recruitment process, often perceived as complex and opaque. Clara.ai was designed to enlighten recruiters' decisions by providing them with relevant and objective analyses.
about_mission_p1_part2: is a modern HR assistant that revolutionizes recruitment through artificial intelligence. Our platform aims to make the pre-screening process more efficient, objective, and focused on the real potential of candidates.
about_feature_1_desc: Candidates record video responses to predefined questions, offering them flexibility and comfort.
about_feature_2_desc: Our AI analyzes videos to assess soft skills, communication, and relevance to the position.
about_feature_3_desc: Each candidate receives a compatibility score based on video analysis and job requirements, allowing recruiters to focus on the best profiles.
about_feature_4_desc: A centralized interface to manage job offers, track applications, and collaborate within the recruitment team.
about_developer_desc_part2: was developed by Mr. Charmant Nyungu K., a consultant in technological innovation and a Congolese pan-Africanist passionate about creating solutions that have a positive impact on the continent.
profile_nav_description: Manage your account and subscription settings.
name: Name
password_description: Change your password. It is advisable to use a strong password that you do not use elsewhere.
subscription_description_new: Choose the plan that's right for your team.
feature_all_basic: All features of the Basic plan
feature_all_quarterly: All features of the Quarterly plan
feature_all_semiannual: All features of the Semiannual plan
feature_all_annual: All features of the Annual plan
analysis_failed_toast_desc: Interview analysis failed. Please try again.
privacy_policy_p1: Your privacy is important to us. It is Clara.ai's policy to respect your privacy regarding any information we may collect from you across our website.
privacy_policy_p2: Log data, device data, and personal information you provide to us.
privacy_policy_p3: We use your information to provide, operate, and maintain our services.
login_prompt: Enter your credentials to access your account
link_copied_toast_desc: The offer link has been copied to the clipboard.
create_video_interview_desc: Set up a new video interview for a job offer.
interview_config_desc: Choose the avatar, job offer, and define the questions.
question: Question
interview_created_toast_desc: The video interview has been successfully configured.
no_interviews_yet_desc: Start by creating your first deferred video interview to invite candidates to participate.
ask_clara_a_question: Ask Clara a question about the app or recruitment.
